thread.section_title: Things Engraved Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Things Engraved Inc. | thingsengraved.ca
thread.title: JR
thread.title_full: Things Engraved Inc. reviewed by JR

author: JR
title: JR
text:
I was very happy with my product of 3D glass printing.
I originally wanted it horizontal but it came vertical, and I couldn't be happier that it did!!! Fit way better with the picture and removing the background gave it more room.
Ordered it on the 7th the 10th it was shipped and the 13th was delivery. Yet my expected delivery date wasn't until the 1st of the next month. In a week I had my product in my hand. Awesome job. Thank you "Things Engraved"
